lead_paragraph: After a summit with the leaders of five Nordic countries, President Obama and the first lady, Michelle Obama, held a dinner for the heads of state, their spouses and a host of celebrities.

headline.main: Obamas Host a Nordic State Dinner With Guests Like Miranda Kerr, Will Ferrell and Aziz Ansari

snippet: After a summit with the leaders of five Nordic countries, President Obama and the first lady, Michelle Obama, held a dinner for the heads of state, their spouses and a host of celebrities.
